summary: وارثین بالقوه‌ی «بازی تاج و تخت» در دنیای تلویزیون
title: وارثین بالقوه‌ی «بازی تاج و تخت» در دنیای تلویزیون
body:
وارثین بالقوه‌ی «بازی تاج و تخت» در دنیای تلویزیون

در سال ۲۰۱۰ حتی نزدیکان دیوید بنیف و دی. بی. ویس (تهیه‌کنندگان GOT) و افراد کارکشته و باتجربه در صنعت تلویزیون هم نمی‌توانستند پتانسیل «بازی تاج و تخت»‌ را متصور شوند. این سریال که از کتاب های فانتزی «نغمه یخ و آتش»‌ اقتباس شده بود، با تکیه بر المان‌های واقع‌گرایانه این سری و جذابیت‌هایی ظریفی که یک دنیای فانتزی به «واقعیت» می‌دهد، به بزرگ‌ترین و محبوب‌ترین سریال تلویزیونی جهان تبدیل شد. با نزدیک…

View On WordPress

blog.name: viverenelloscurita
blog.title: Vivere nell'oscurità
blog.description: Sono quella ragazza che sta sempre nell'ombra, quella che sai che c'è ma ti dimentichi che esiste. Quella un po' strana che non parla con nessuno e sta sempre sulle sue. Quella che se le dici qualcosa di sbagliato ti urla contro senza che tu sappia il reale motivo. Colei che non parlerà mai dei suoi problemi perché non si fida di nessuno. Quella fredda, senza emozioni, che ha creato un muro intorno a sé per evitare di soffrire ancora. Capirmi non è facile, come non lo è starmi vicino, ma se riesci ad entrare nel mio cuore, puoi essere certo che ci sarò sempre per te e ti darò tutto, ogni parte di me perché metto sempre al primo posto le persone che amo. 💔

summary: [No Spoilers] What is your favorite official GoT Soundtrack song?
title: [No Spoilers] What is your favorite official GoT Soundtrack song?
body:
For me, it’s “Winds of Winter” from Season 6. The chanting is mesmerizing and it shares the title of my favorite episode in the TV series.

I also like “The Tower” from season six, because it’s so perfect for such a huge moment in the show.



Source: https://ift.tt/2IJN6SZ

summary: New York Comic Con is home to some of the hottest exclusives that you will ever see, which begins on a high note yesterday...
body:
New York Comic Con is home to some of the hottest exclusives that you will ever see, which begins on a high note yesterday (October 4) and will remain till October 7. Taking place at the Javits Convention Center in midtown Manhattan, it’s already begun welcoming fans from all over the world to take part.

To make it more interesting, HBO is taking to the streets of the Big Apple during New York Comic Con, partnering with Funko for an official pop-up shop throughout the convention.

The collection set to include collectible Funko products such as Pop! Vinyls, Pop! Keychains, Pop! Tees, Dorbz, pint glasses and more, from beloved HBO series Game of Thrones, Westworld, Silicon Valley, Veep, and Last Week Tonight with John Oliver. This limited time event will be open from 10 am to 8 pm on all the event days.

Check it out here:

This slideshow requires JavaScript.

Recently, HBO is also commemorating a decade of filming in Northern Ireland by opening up sites featured in the show to the public as attractions including Winterfell, Castle Black, and Kings Landing. In addition to the sets, the plan is also to potentially include a formal studio tour of Linen Mill Studios, which will showcase content from the series spanning all seasons and settings.

In addition, famed scotch maker Johnnie Walker is launching single malt scotch whisky collection inspired by the villainous White Walkers of HBO’s hit series.

Game of Thrones was a big winner at the 70th Primetime Emmy Awards, taking home the award for ‘outstanding drama series.’

The fantasy-drama will conclude with its eighth season premiering in 2019. The tentative targeted open date is set for 2019.

NYCC 2018: HBO brings new wave of ‘Game of Thrones’ merchandises New York Comic Con is home to some of the hottest exclusives that you will ever see, which begins on a high note yesterday (October 4) and will remain till October 7.

tags: what? no--i'm not a nerd... why do you ask?
summary: Hogwarts House-sortings Prt. II; Game of Thrones
body:
Hogwarts House-sortings Prt. II; Game of Thrones

. Ravenclaw

. Sansa Stark • Bran Stark • Tyrion Lannister

Roose Bolton • Shereen Baratheon • Samwell Tarly

Jon Arryn • Doran Martell • Missandei • Gilly

. Jojen Reed • Qyburn

.

. Slytherin

. Tywin Lannister • Olenna Tyrell • Margaery Tyrell

. Loras Tyrell • Lord Walder Frey • Petyr Baelish

. Bronn of the Blackwater • Shae

.

. Hufflepuff

. Jon Snow • Eddard ‘Ned’ Stark • Hodor

. Myrcella Baratheon-Lannister

Sandor Clegane • Renly Baratheon • Stannis Baratheon

. Davos the Seaworth • Walda 'Fat Walda’ Bolton

. Hot Pie • Ser Barriston Selmy • Grey Worm

Brienne of Tarth • Theon Greyjoy • Podrick Payne

.

. Griffindor

. Robb Stark • Rickon Stark • Catelyn Stark • Arya Stark

. Jaime Lannister • Joffrey Baratheon-Lannister

. Gregor Clegane • Ramsay Snow • Robert Baratheon

. Daenerys Targaryen • Viserys Targaryen

. Lyanna Mormont • Randyll Tarly • Dickon Tarly

. Gendry • Jorah Mormont • Daario Naharis

. Tormund Giantsbane • Yara Greyjoy

Ellaria Sand • Obara Sand • Ygritte • Meera Reed

.

. !Viewer Interactive!

—-The part of the show where Host comes out to invite you in.

. Today’s activity is a 'Helping Hands’ conversation:

. As I’m sure you’ve noticed, there is a whole set of characters missing from the roster above. Host has had an inability to sort them and would like to give Readers the opportunity to start a conversation and discuss where and why they feel a particular character listed below belongs in which Hogwarts House.

. Host presents:

. 💼 Make a case for them! 💼

. Cersei Lannister • Tommen Baratheon-Lannister

. Lysa Arryn • Robert Arryn • Varys 'The Spider’

. Mance Raider • Euron Greyjoy

Mace Tyrell • Kevan Lannister • Lancel Lannister

. The High Sparrow • Khal Drogo • Jeor Mormont

Maester Pycelle • The High Sparrow • Melisandre

.

. If you have any questions, comments, concerns, or complaints, please, feel free to drop me a note.

Next post in series: (CW)The 100 sorting

. !Viewer Interactive!

—-The part of the show where Host comes out to invite you in.

. Today’s activity is a 'Helping Hands’ conversation:

. As I’m sure you’ve noticed, there is a whole set of characters missing from the roster above. Host has had an inability to sort them and would like to give Readers the opportunity to start a conversation and discuss where and why they feel a particular character listed below belongs in which Hogwarts House.

. Host presents:

. 💼 Make a case for them! 💼

. Cersei Lannister • Tommen Baratheon-Lannister

. Lysa Arryn • Robert Arryn • Varys 'The Spider’

Maester Pycelle • The High Sparrow • Melisandre

. If you have any questions, comments, concerns, or complaints, please, feel free to drop me a note.
